TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/SelectedListViewItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 表示在列表视图控件中选定项的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of selected items in a list view control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A存储中的选定的项控件。A stores the selected items in a control. 项目存储在项包含在。The items stored in the are items contained in the . 存储中显示的所有项目。The stores all items displayed in the . 下表显示如何的示例中存储的项示例中其所选内容状态以及控件。The following table shows an example of how the stores the items of the as well as their selection states in an example control. |索引Index|项Item|列表视图中的选定状态Selection state in the ListView| |-----------|----------|-------------------------------------| |00|item1Item1|未选定Unselected| |11|Item2Item2|已选定Selected| |22|Item3Item3|未选定Unselected| |33|Item4Item4|已选定Selected| |44|Item5Item5|已选定Selected| 基于上表中的示例中下, 表说明了如何将出现。Based on the example in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the would appear. |索引Index|ListViewItemCollection 中选定的项Selected item in the ListViewItemCollection| |-----------|-------------------------------------------------| |00|Item2Item2| |11|Item4Item4| |22|Item5Item5| 可以使用的属性和方法的此类来执行各种任务的集合。You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection. 方法使您能够确定的某个项是否类为属于。The method enables you to determine whether an item from the class is a member of the . 一旦您知道该项目集合中，你可以使用方法来确定的位置中的项。Once you know that the item is in the collection, you can use the method to determine the position of the item in the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用，事件，和成员和类。The following code example demonstrates using the , event, and members and the class. 若要运行此示例中，粘贴以下代码中一个包含窗体对象名为`ListView1`和名为`TextBox1`。To run this example, paste the following code in a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. 调用`InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或事件处理程序。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or the event handler. 此示例需要该事件处理程序与正确关联事件This example requires that the event handler is correctly associated with the event [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性对应的密钥中。The property corresponds to the key for a in the . 键比较不区分大小写。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果`key`参数是`null`或空字符串，返回`false`。If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, returns `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于将合并到单个阵列中的多个集合中的选定的项。You can use this method to combine the selected items from multiple collections into a single array.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取集合中的项数。

span.span: Gets the number of items in the collection.
The number of items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够确定中选定项的数目控件。This property enables you to determine the number of selected items in the control. 当循环访问集合的值，然后可以使用此值和你需要提供要执行循环的迭代次数。You can then use this value when looping through the values of the collection and you need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop. 除非属性设置为`true`，此属性始终返回值为零 (0) 或一 （1） 具体取决于您是否有选定的项。Unless the property of the is set to `true`, this property always returns a value of zero (0) or one (1) depending on whether you have a selected item.

returns.span: 集合中项的从零开始的索引。

returns.span: 如果该项不在集合中，则返回值为负 1 (-1)。

span.span: If the item is not located in the collection, the return value is negative one (-1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一旦你知道某个项是所选的项集合中 (使用方法)，你可以使用方法来确定的位置中的项。Once you know that an item is in the selected item collection (using the method), you can use the method to determine the position of the item in the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 IndexOfKey(string key) cil managed
Public Overridable Function IndexOfKey (key As String) As Integer

param.name: key
param.span: 要在集合中查找的项的名称。

span.span: The name of the item to find in the collection.

summary.span: 返回具有指定键的项的第一个匹配项的索引。

span.span: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the item with the specified key.

returns.span: 具有指定键的第一个项的索引（从零开始）。

span.span: The zero-based index of the first item with the specified key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性对应的密钥中。The property corresponds to the key for a in the . 键比较不区分大小写。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果`key`参数是`null`或空字符串，返回-1。If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, returns -1. 如果连续，最后调用返回索引将首先，检查的键的匹配项，如果没有匹配项，从集合的开头开始搜索。If is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection.
